name: Markdown
title: This is a quick reference cheat sheet to the Markdown syntax.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This is a quick reference cheat sheet to the Markdown syntax.

cards.title: Blockquotes
cards.body:
```markdown
> This is  
> a blockquote
>
> > Nested  
> > Blockquote
```

cards.title: Unordered List
cards.body:
```markdown
* Item 1
* Item 2
  * item 3a
  * item 3b
```

or

```markdown
- Item 1
- Item 2
```

or

```markdown
_ Item 1
+ Item 2
```

or

```markdown
- [ ] Checkbox off
- [x] Checkbox on
```

cards.title: Ordered List
cards.body:
```markdown
1. Item 1
2. Item 2  
   a. Item 3a  
   b. Item 3b
```

cards.title: Escaped code
cards.body:
Escaped code blocks can be done with more back ticks on the outside or a different symbol.

`````markdown
````markdown
```bash
echo hi
```
````

~~~markdown
```bash
echo hi
```
~~~

`````

cards.title: Tables
cards.body:
```markdown
| Left column | Center column | Right column |
| :---------- | :-----------: | -----------: |
| Cell 1      |   Centered    |        $1600 |
| Cell 2      |    Cell 3     |          $12 |
```

Simple style

```markdown
Left column | Center column | Right column
:----------:|:-------------:|:-----------:
   Cell 1   |   Centered    |    $1600
   Cell 2   |    Cell 3     |     $12
```

A markdown table generator: [tableconvert.com](https://tableconvert.com/)

cards.title: Backslash escapes
cards.body: | Characters | Escape | Description | | ----------------- | --------------------- | :-------------------- | | \\ | \\\\ | Backslash | | \` | \\\` | Backtick | | \* | \\\* | Asterisk | | \_ | \\\_ | Underscore | | \{\} | \\\{\\\} | Curly braces | | \[\] | \\\[\\\] | Square brackets | | \(\) | \\\(\\\) | Parentheses | | \# | \\\# | Hash mark | | \+ | \\\+ | Plus sign | | \- | \\\- | Minus sign \(hyphen\) | | \. | \\\. | Dot | | \! | \\\! | Exclamation mark |
